attributes.action: Return to the taxpayer, the money saved in the prison system due to lower amounts of crime.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since crime has fallen so dramatically since local police forces were cut down (govt figures), one would assume that prisons are now virtually empty? We are told that it costs a huge amount of money to keep criminals in prison, so now there should be a huge pot of cash that is not required.

We petition the government to return this unspent cash to the British taxpayers.
